name: Remember ALPHA 0.3.5
description:
Remember is an atmospheric puzzle game where you uncover the mysterious events of your past.

This is a very early alpha version of the game.

Feel free to test our current build and help us to improve the actual core of the game. we would be very grateful for your feedback. especially feedback about bugs, performance issues  and your expectations would help us a lot to provide a solid game experience in the near future. feedback regarding performance should also include your system specifications and game settings (resolution, quality preset). if your pc won't be able to handle the ultra preset, we can provide you with more graphical presets. just let us know.

The demo provides some puzzles and the basic handling of the game. Enjoy!
